comment: She's AMAZING. If you have the chance, take any class with her.

I loved everything about interviewing skills with Dr Lance. I only used the book once during the midterm. She's not "easy" but if you put your all into the class, then you will get a good grade. She instilled my confidence in being a HS major. Can't wait to take her again... Take her!!!

Dr. Lance is very passionate about what she teaches. This class included a book review paper, 2 quizzes, a final and a presentation on a topic of our choice. She is helpful and clear when lecturing. Come to class and you will do well on her quizzes, also attendence is a part of your grade. I would take her again.
A sweet teacher.  She is very passionate about the information giving in class. I would am taking her again.
Wonderful teacher she is so sweet and she so helpful.  She is a awesome teacher to take If you want to or need to take the class. Please take her Wonderful person to know and learn from .

LOVE her! She's very laid back and the class is very interesting. Lots of videos and she encourages participation in lectures. All lectures online and the tests come straight from the study guide. Take her!
